title: Limited Queues
body: So I haven't played on the OCE server in a while, since most of my friends are in NA, but I decided to log in today and I could only access blind pick and ARAM.  Is there a specific reason why I can't access the other queues.

replies.body: Okay thanks.  That makes sense.  I'll just have to learn the schedules ^_^

Hey KatzExtreme,

Some of our game modes are disabled as they would not be able to sustain good quality matchmaking or queue times for their modes due to our smaller population. We currently run some game modes on a limited schedule to promote play during those hours and are constantly evaluating our ability to expand them or introduce other limited queues.
